At least I'm not losing. Wait...

A loss for me? Oh well...

If I pay you back after this game, will you make sure that footage of it doesn't reach Helene?

It looks like I messed up again. Oh well...

Aww, me? Watch this.
Why am I the one who's losing?
Looks like I need to work harder...
Well, I hope I've satisfied someone.
Well, at least someone is happy...

Ha ha ha! Well, I'm not your average princess. I'm also a goddess.
I'll lose my belt. Will you be happy that you'll get to see a tiny bit more of my cleavage?

My sleeve will go. Don't let me catch you trying to steal it...

Whatever. Don't get too excited, okay?

I don't know how I did it, but I lost my sword on the way here. I hope nobody stole it...
Even though they hardly covered my feet, I suddenly feel colder...

Congratulations. My arms now look symmetrical.

How do I look?

If you're wondering why I asked you to wait, I get wedgies very often.
It's your turn to remove something, ~player~.
What'll it be this time, ~player~?
You can't win forever, ~player~.
Don't forget to remove something nice, ~player~.
Be a nice boy and remove something good, ~player~.
Please remove something nice, ~player~.

You better reward me for doing this, ~player~...
You better remove something nice, ~player~!
Pit and Palutena. How are you two doing? Is everything okay?
Oh, Palutena. There's something I've been meaning to ask you. Would it be okay with you if Pit visited Helene sometime, or vice versa? It could be fun.
Are you taking a break from fighting, you two? I retired a long time ago.
Is it fun fighting Ryu, Palutena? I fought him once.
I'm surprised that you're here, Pit. Is everything okay?
Are you still fighting, Pit? Don't you ever get tired of it?
You look like you've grown since I last saw you, Pit. Don't work yourself too hard, okay?

Ryu, I heard that you're fighting Palutena. Is it fun fighting a goddess again?

Excuse me?

What've you got for us, ~name~?

Show us something nice, ~name~.

Strip off something good, ~name~...

Please be fair and remove something nice, ~player~.
